Reviews.Title: House- works Thermometer
Reviews.Author: bergman47
Reviews.Content: So cheap that it arrived broken. The thermometer doesnt work and the plastic hooks for the keys fall right off with the weight of a regular key. Do not buy!! You will be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Dragon6700
Reviews.Content: It is poor quality.  The plastic body is very thin and see-through and you can seea key inside. You can't hide the keys.

Reviews.Title: OK - no screws included to mount the thermometer
Reviews.Author: D. Heisey Grove "dheisey"
Reviews.Content: It's a functioning thermometer, but there are no screws included to mount the unit to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Very obvious
Reviews.Author: LeeAnn
Reviews.Content: When I received this in the mail I was completely disappointed. First off the glass thermometer part had come unglued to I had to fix that right away. Second, it is so big and bulky that it is so obvious it is made for hiding something inside. I had to set it up against the door frame so it wasn't as noticeable.

Reviews.Title: Broken upon arrival
Reviews.Author: Dblg311
Reviews.Content: This looked like a good idea when I was looking around for a hiding place for a spare key. But upon arrival and inspecting the product I saw where the two "key holders" that are hidden in the product were both broken and unable to hold a key. I wasn't sure if it had shipped from the factory like this or was damaged during shipping, so I chalked this up as a loss and have used something else.

Reviews.Title: Key Hooks Broke Inside
Reviews.Author: Elissa
Reviews.Content: This is a good product in theory, hangs on my back porch and is very utilitarian.I needed to retrieve the key one day, was unable to get it off of the hook inside and ultimately snapped the hook off.  The face also is hard to move up and down.If you purchase this, I'd advise to put your key on a small ring first to avoid destroying your purchase.

Reviews.Title: Its what it is
Reviews.Author: Manuel
Reviews.Content: This looks very very cheap, the red line is not glued right and it looks very very veeeeery suspicious... but if you put it between some other things, it might not look that weird and do what it is supposed to.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Low Quality
Reviews.Author: Charon "Charon"
Reviews.Content: Two stars because it will serve its function.  The product is the lowest quality you can imagine. The thermometer piece has glue oozed out all over it.  The box has scratches all over it, and does not look like it will withstand outdoor use for long.  Worth maybe $1.99 without shipping

Reviews.Title: JUNK,JUNK,JUNK
Reviews.Author: Fuzz
Reviews.Content: After so many BAD reviews you would think they fix it. NOPE, different day some s***. Came broken,went right in the trash.Don.t buy anything from stalwart.

Reviews.Title: hide-a-key
Reviews.Author: Nikolas Libson
Reviews.Content: The thermometer part of it removed or broken, therefore it did not look like a working thermometer.  It seemed to be "cheaply" made

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your $$
Reviews.Author: Bret61081 "Bret"
Reviews.Content: I went to put it up and the glass part fell out before I even had a chance to hang it.  CHEAP and case too thick to look like a regular thermometer.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made.
Reviews.Author: Grant Dryden "GDD"
Reviews.Content: Made very cheap.  I had to take the thermomator part back onto the box and for a hidden key compartment it is blantly obvious that there is something stored in it.  They could (and should) have went with about half the size compartment on the back.  plus if the sun hits on it right, you can see a dark something in the back of the thermometor when just one key is hanging inside of it.  Save your money or buy the hidden key rock.

Reviews.Title: s***ty
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: when i got thermometer the little red part that shows the temp wasnt in proper and it broke when it fell on the floor so I didnt even get to use it. I think they need to find a better way to keep it in not just glue.

Reviews.Title: Hides it well, but does not look realistic. Kind of thick.
Reviews.Author: kickflip42585
Reviews.Content: This item is a little thick for hiding a single key, but it does have room for two. There are two hooks behind the cover (upper and lower spots), but if they were not a deep it would have made a slimmer profile and looked more realistic.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Laura Quinn
Reviews.Content: Don't bother!!! This is the cheapest looking thermometer EVER. Not only that, it broke in my hand when I picked it up out of the shipping box.

Reviews.Title: Sneaky buy!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie R Engelhardt
Reviews.Content: This is a good find.  My son and husband are good at locking their keys in the house.  It is light and doesn't take up much room.  The temp reading seems pretty accurate too.

Reviews.Title: Looks good but
Reviews.Author: Whiner "feisty dog"
Reviews.Content: This product looks good but hard to open.  We'll need to glue scale into place for a more realistic look; as received the scale is removable.  OVerall it's ok but wanted it to function easier.

Reviews.Title: Thermometer Hide A Key
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product to hide a key for my house so any emergency personal would have access to my home. I recently bought a medical emergency system and needed to have a key hidden for entry. I found the hide a key thermometer on Amazon and was very pleased once I received it at the high quality and the fact that it is an actual working product.  I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a unique way to hide a key.

Reviews.Title: It tells the temperature, but is not well made
Reviews.Author: SD
Reviews.Content: If you need something to tell the temperature this isn't so bad, but it comes with no mounting hardware and is made of fairly cheap plastic. Also, as a "hide-a-key" the seam is very obvious and I think I'll just use it as a thermometer.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointing item.
Reviews.Author: Mary Jane Kumagai
Reviews.Content: I wanted something so that my daughter could hide a key @ her house. The picture was a bit deceiving. When I opened the package the glue on the thermometer had failed & it fell out. I think I can glue it back together but the unit is so thick it's almost a give away that it's meant to "hide" something inside.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Ariel Alfaro
Reviews.Content: I purchased this after my boyfriend and I kept locking ourselves out of our house and having to call someone with a spare to let us back in. My boyfriend chose this hide a key because it looked inconspicuous. When it arrived I wasn't too happy with the materials. Granted, this is a pretty cheap price for a hide a key. It's made out of very cheap plastic and it looks inconspicuous from afar, but if someone were really looking to break into my house I feel like they could tell this was a hide a key and would be able to just let themselves in. Because of this I am reluctant to but my spare in here, but the thermometer works!

Reviews.Title: OK, but could be better
Reviews.Author: Bobby Jones
Reviews.Content: Works, but plastic case is heat sensitive and sliding door binds when heat warps the case.  Could be made from better materials.

Reviews.Title: Good solution
Reviews.Author: Willie B. "Willie B."
Reviews.Content: An inexpensive way to guarantee that you never lock yourself out. Everyone sees it but nobody suspects that there is a key inside.

Reviews.Title: Hot. Garbage.
Reviews.Author: Billy Delli-Gatti
Reviews.Content: This may be the worst thing I have ever purchased, the glass thermometer fell out of the plastic housing as soon as I opened the package! Don't waste your time with this trash.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Kathi
Reviews.Content: These were flimsy and the thermometer falls out, even after regluing. I would not recommend these ( I bought 2) to any family or friends.

Reviews.Title: key hider
Reviews.Author: tarnation
Reviews.Content: Very very cheaply made. If you're going to use this, put it somewhere half hidden, cuz it's a deep box for a key or 2 and stands out like a sore thumb. You'll need to take the whole thing off the wall to open the box, so don't secure it for good anywhere. Screws or nails are not included and the holes are huge. And don't depend on the thermometer, it's been stuck at 75'F since arriving when it's been in the mid-40s here.

Reviews.Title: Too hard to read
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Czerniak "WIannie"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband, but he would rather have one that is round with large numbers and not fine print.

Reviews.Title: hide-a-key
Reviews.Author: Jackie D.
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this to anyone who wanted a hide-a-key.  Very nice .. and had no problem installing it.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Manoel
Reviews.Content: Sometimes my kitchen door locks by itself, and I needed a place to hide my key in the garage. Great to hide my key in the garage

Reviews.Title: Stawart 72-48149 Thermometer Hide-A-Key
Reviews.Author: Brandy
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I never got to use this item as it came damaged and leaking ( mercury? ) fluid.  The numbers on the thermometer were smeared and unreadable.  It was ordered as a gift but, I just threw it in the trash upon opening it. I can't comment on customer service since I never notified them, so it may have been just one of those "flukes" that sometimes happen.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Cameron Smith
Reviews.Content: Can't even tell it's hiding a key. The temperature measurement is accurate and it looks nice, the only issue would be that it's a bit difficult to open without taking it completely off the wall. It's not drilled to the wall so it's not that big of a deal.

Reviews.Title: Horriable
Reviews.Author: daivd berger
Reviews.Content: This came and the glass  came right out ,also it doesn't register the temperature it stays at the same the last three days. So if someone looks at it  there going to wonder if its real or not.I didn't send it back because it would cost me to ship back the same price I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: worth
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about this Hide-A-Key because it is also a Thermometer which is less obvious.  But upon receiving it, I am not happy.  The glass thermometer piece was broken off of the item.  Instead of going through the hassle of returning it, I will just super glue it back on.  And there is not a lot of room for keys inside the item which I was not excited about.  I had to take them off the key rings to make them fit.  I love the idea, but would not buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Really shoddy build.  Can probably be fixed with Super Glue but why should I have to...it's NEW!!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Thermometer doesn't even attach to the plastic unit.  I hope nobody actually buys this for the thermometer and not just to hide a house key.

Reviews.Title: Good hide-a-way
Reviews.Author: Nora Cartner "book surfer"
Reviews.Content: Very deceptive type storage for an outdoor key. Blends in well with our paint color and trim. Easy to place in an inconspicuous place.

Reviews.Title: Love thermometer hide a key as compared to a pet rock hide a key.
Reviews.Author: Lynda Schrader
Reviews.Content: We had one similar to this for many years and it broke.  We couldn't find another one and was thrilled when we found this one.  It works so much better for us than a pet rock.

Reviews.Title: solved my problem
Reviews.Author: EJ
Reviews.Content: Now I can get into my cousins storage unit if I forget my key.  So much easier than returning home.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: PegNM "reluctant reviewer"
Reviews.Content: The construction is cheap, the thermometer fell off (glue didn't hold), but it does hide the key from sight, so it's ok.

Reviews.Title: Is very "cheap" looking
Reviews.Author: Shanna L. Miller
Reviews.Content: The thermometer hide-a-key is definitely functional, but the item is cheap looking white plastic. I had hoped that it would look a bit nicer.

Reviews.Title: Hide that key
Reviews.Author: Susan A. Stiles
Reviews.Content: Very handy device for a moderately Adisabled person! It allows easy entry for assistance when it is required. A good companion piece for an alert system. Novel product

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Loopy
Reviews.Content: works great and very handy, well made to last cold minnesota weather and very usefull too.  wow neat idea.  love it

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Leroy (Lee) McDowell
Reviews.Content: This product is made from a hard plastic which appears easily broken.  The shipper send product by USPS standard delivery. I arrived with a portion broken off the case which attaches to the outside wall. I guess I could use it to hide a key OK but am concerned about bugs, etc getting into it and building a nest. Notified the seller of the problem and they authorized me to return it but I would have to pay for the return. Not what I expected from an Amazon vendor.EDIT:  The shipper (Frank) has offered to play for the shipping to return the broken product but I'm going to see if I can just glue the broken piece back into place. It's not like it should be that difficult for me to do. Would sure save time.

Reviews.Title: It's not a real thermometer
Reviews.Author: Vicki H. Eaker "veaker"
Reviews.Content: I thought it was a real thermometer, but it is not. It needs to be made a bit more obvious and perhaps not call in a "thermometer" hide a key.

Reviews.Title: Cheap!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect too much for the price but was still disappointed. Arrived with thermometer unglued from plastic. Very chincy.

Reviews.Title: It Works!
Reviews.Author: KAHSR
Reviews.Content: What can I say, this baby does both jobs it is sold for. It has a very accurate thermometer and no one has a clue it holds the key to the door behind it.

Reviews.Title: Hide a Key Thermometer
Reviews.Author: W. M. Renshaw
Reviews.Content: Very good idea. Hung it outside near my storage shed so I don't have to always go back in the house for the key. Use it almost daily.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: chuckleby
Reviews.Content: I almost got one of those rocks that hides keys, but then I saw this. So cool!! It's easy to open and hang your hidden keys. And it even tells the right temperature!

Reviews.Title: A little flemsy.
Reviews.Author: S. Haas
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a really convenient way to hide a spare key.  Plus, the thermometer works!  Great for a garage or deck.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected.
Reviews.Author: M. Henry
Reviews.Content: The Hide-A-Key Thermometer works as expected. It was easy to mount on the wall beside my door and provides real easy access to a key. One thing I do wonder about is whether it's too obvious a place for a key. I would think that any decent burglar would know all about popular key hiding places, but I view the thing as basically a convenient place to put a key outside for my own use--a better place, in any event, than just hanging it on a nail beside the door. Burglars will get in if they want to; key or no key.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!  Easy!
Reviews.Author: krazekt
Reviews.Content: You slide the cover and there are 2 spots for keys - it is lightweight and easy to hang up!  I started using it right away - WELL worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Hate it isn't appropriate.
Reviews.Author: JOY ROBERTS
Reviews.Content: I did receive the paper bowls, but not the thermometer hide-a-key.I don't believe they were coming from the same place, so it's unlikely that they were in the same box.

ProductInfo.Features:
Working thermometer
Concealed and secure key compartment with space for two keys
Thermometer is 6.375-Inch tall, 2-Inch wide and 1-Inch deep
ProductInfo.Name: Stalwart 72-48149 Thermometer Hide-A-Key
